attributes.action: treat death by dangours driving as murder
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unexceptable at the sentances set for dangourous driving, a man has killed 2 (3 if you count the woman's unborn child) whilst speeding and running a red light then refusing to stop after hitting the woman and dragging her down the road under his car, was given mearly 7 years. If someone kills someone whilst driving dangourous then this must be treat with the severity it has earned

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
